function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi systems in real-world conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Occupational risk of exposure to uvgi without proper precautions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research on upper-room uvgi systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the impact of humidity and ventilation on uvgi effectiveness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential sensitivity of bacteria in deionized water to uvgi compared to bacteria in droplet nuclei","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regulation and standardization for uvgi installation techniques","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk to maintenance personnel during uvgi applications in ahu and ductwork","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of practical application evaluation of uvgi in health care buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient knowledge base and guidelines for uvgi application in health care","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the practical application of uvgi in health care buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of the efficacy of direct uvgi on intraoperative air quality and prevention of infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of uvgi at high air change rates ach","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Niosh hierarchy of controls approach not being followed for personnel safety","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unspecified skin and eye symptoms attributed to germicidal uv-c radiation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tampering with uvgi lamp controls","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discontinuation of uvgi without alternative infection control measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of insufficient uv radiation emission from the fixture","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental impact of uv-c lamps using low-pressure mercury","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate exposure to uv radiation due to distance and airflow pattern","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective inactivation of airborne bacteria by upper-room uvgi","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in effectiveness of uvgi with higher ventilation flow rate","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective cleansing of infectious particles in upper-room uvgi zone","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection methods for medical devices and surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of no-touch full room disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of reliable uv dose evaluation model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection of the air and surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of uvgi surface disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of rigorous study on the energy conservation and maintenance cost savings from uvgi lamps in ahus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unfounded claims of reduced health care-associated infections hais from ahu-installed uvgi.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Localized effectiveness of uv-c lamps in ahus may not impact overall air quality and contamination.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased effectiveness of uvgi system when fixtures are placed on one side of the room.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bacteria studied primarily as single cells aerosolized in deionized water, lacking mucus coating, may be more sensitive to uvgi.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of uvgi for reducing droplet nuclei concentration in the room as an alternative to mechanical ventilation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ahus including in-duct applications.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate mixing of room air, leading to reduced effectiveness of upper-room uvgi fixtures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent control of temperature and relative humidity in rooms with upper-room uvgi fixtures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate uv fluence rate in the upper air of the room","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven uvgi distribution in the upper room due to fixture installation and lamp failure.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability of hvac system to efficiently kill microbes transmitted by droplets.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi in inactivating more-resistant bacteria and fungal spores","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate mixing of room air for uvgi to effectively inactivate microorganisms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorrect implementation of combination of general ventilation system and uv lamps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to uv light at 253.7 nm can cause harm to unprotected skin and eyes.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi fixtures in inactivating certain types of microorganisms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of uvgi efficacy on airflow conditions in the room.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spores being resistant to uvgi can lead to ineffective removal of biological agents.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of uvgi depends strongly on the type of virus nucleic acid, leading to varying susceptibility to uv inactivation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High rh relative humidity providing protection against uv-induced dna or rna damage for viruses.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation system causing the spread of airborne diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misidentification of true airborne infectious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
